Input: stmfts - do not leave device disabled in stmfts_input_open

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 258222321f49329f9e3f223d8cf67be9110ec96e, it was introduced in version v5.17.10 by commit 54da6289fb1d7367354702923e802b3ad6925fe3. For more details please see the references link.
